name: Mutants & Zombies
description:
Mutants & Zombies is a first-person shooter (FPS). A zombie apocalypse has occurred in the world and the survivors have to hide in safe shelters. You have to take on the role of an ordinary tramp and try to survive in this harsh world! Explore dangerous locations, kill zombies and mutants, complete various tasks and most importantly, do everything necessary to survive!

Peculiarities
- Pleasant music
- Colorful graphics
- Dangerous opponents
